document_data.name: Baliaka Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Baliaka Hall''' was a guildhall located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The hall was located in the southern section of Almorel near the sprawling residence of [[Mechnik]] [[Nikitsky]].
document_data.Activities: The Baliaka Hall served as the guildhall for [[bard]]s and other entertainers within Almorel.
